name: Easy Post Re-Order
author: Umair Saleem

sections.description:
A very powerful plugin people can easily re-order posts and media images, This Easy Post Re-order, Re order your Posts and Media (Images) using the Drag and Drop easily update your sort. Also add Ajax Features for easy ordering

  • Posts Re-Order
  • Media Re-order
  • Images Re-Order
  • Post Re-Order
  • Posts sort
  • Media sort
  • Images sort
  • Post sort
  • Custom Post Type Sort

Powered By: Easy Softonic
sections.installation:
1. Upload easy-post-re-order folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin from Admin > Plugins menu.
  3. Once activated you should check with Settings > Easy Post Re-Order
  4. Use Re-Order link which appear into each post type section to make your sort.
sections.faq: Feel free to contact us at info@easysoftonic.com
